definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: There is a searing intensity about the stripe which I have just laid across your arse.
sentences.chinese: 我的这一下抽打让你的屁股感到灼热的感觉。

sentences.english: The days were scorching and overcast.
sentences.chinese: 第3天的那一天，天气是灼热和阴沉的。

sentences.english: Difficulty during urination, or feel pain or burns.
sentences.chinese: 排尿不顺或感觉疼痛或有灼热感。

sentences.english: The way is long, and the dust is hot in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 道路是漫长的，烈日下路上的尘土火一般灼热。

sentences.english: He had reached the floor, his breath coming in searing gasps.
sentences.chinese: 他来到了地板上，他的呼出的气息变得灼热起来。

sentences.english: I didn’t recognize the heartburn for what it was because I had never experienced it before.
sentences.chinese: 我没有识别出胃灼热，因为我以前从未经历过。

sentences.english: Over the counter drugs and medications can also help in heartburn relief .
sentences.chinese: 在反毒品和药物也可以帮助胃灼热救济。

sentences.english: Proton pump inhibitors can tackle really stubborn heartburn.
sentences.chinese: 质子泵抑制剂可以治疗顽固性胃灼热。

sentences.english: A short time after that, I stared having heartburn.
sentences.chinese: 一个短的时间之后，我看着有胃灼热。

sentences.english: It is a blazing hot expanse of rolling sand dunes under a cloudless sky.
sentences.chinese: 万里无云的天空下，它是一片充满流沙的灼热区域。

sentences.english: The metal glowed in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 金属在熔炉里发出灼热的光。

sentences.english: If they move from their positions, the glyph flares with searing light.
sentences.chinese: 当他们一离开原地，符文就会闪出灼热的光芒。

sentences.english: Such heat and pressure exist only in the hot, liquid mass of molten rock deep inside the earth.
sentences.chinese: 这种高热和高压只存在于地球深处灼热的岩浆中。

sentences.english: THE spring flowers break out like the passionate pain of unspoken love.
sentences.chinese: 春花怒放，就像我那未说出口的爱情的灼热的痛苦。

sentences.english: The long drought has left the cornfields parched and brown.
sentences.chinese: 长时间的干旱使玉米变得灼热枯黄。

definition: to gush/to squirt/to surge/to well out/to overflow
burning hot/fiery/to have one's hair permed with hot curling tongs
